values: The Supremacy of Christ and the Sorrow of CalamityThe Supremacy of Christ and the Sorrow of Calamity

The suffering of this present world exists by the sovereign plan of God, in order that the horrors of sin and the wonders of God’s grace in Christ might be shown.
